---
applyTo: "**"
---

The functions in the Array API Elementwise Operations include:
abs(x,/)
acos(x,/)
acosh(x,/)
add(x1,x2,/)
asin(x,/)
asinh(x,/)
atan(x,/)
atan2(x1,x2,/)
atanh(x,/)
bitwise_and(x1,x2,/)
bitwise_left_shift(x1,x2,/)
bitwise_invert(x,/)
bitwise_or(x1,x2,/)
bitwise_right_shift(x1,x2,/)
bitwise_xor(x1,x2,/)
ceil(x,/)
clip(x,/,min=None,max=None)
conj(x,/)
copysign(x1,x2,/)
cos(x,/)
cosh(x,/)
divide(x1,x2,/)
equal(x1,x2,/)
exp(x,/)
expm1(x,/)
floor(x,/)
floor_divide(x1,x2,/)
greater(x1,x2,/)
greater_equal(x1,x2,/)
hypot(x1,x2,/)
imag(x,/)
isfinite(x,/)
isinf(x,/)
isnan(x,/)
less(x1,x2,/)
less_equal(x1,x2,/)
log(x,/)
log1p(x,/)
log2(x,/)
log10(x,/)
logaddexp(x1,x2,/)
logical_and(x1,x2,/)
logical_not(x,/)
logical_or(x1,x2,/)
logical_xor(x1,x2,/)
maximum(x1,x2,/)
minimum(x1,x2,/)
multiply(x1,x2,/)
negative(x,/)
nextafter(x1,x2,/)
not_equal(x1,x2,/)
positive(x,/)
pow(x1,x2,/)
real(x,/)
reciprocal(x,/)
remainder(x1,x2,/)
round(x,/)
sign(x,/)
signbit(x,/)
sin(x,/)
sinh(x,/)
square(x,/)
sqrt(x,/)
subtract(x1,x2,/)
tan(x,/)
tanh(x,/)
trunc(x,/)
